import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { GlobalContext } from "../context/GlobalState"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Table, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; const LiveCampaigns = () => { const { campaigns, editCampaign } = useContext(GlobalContext); const liveCampaigns = campaigns.filter(campaign => campaign.status === 'Sent'); return (
{liveCampaigns.map(campaign => { return ( ) })}
Live Campaigns Amount Sent Click Through Rates
{campaign.name} {campaign.stats.sent} {campaign.stats.clicked}
) } export default LiveCampaigns;
